resources.string: DSC is a Google Developers program for university students, designed to help them build their mobile and web development skills and knowledge. It is open to any student, ranging from novice developers who are just starting, to advanced developers who want to further their skills. It is intended to be a space for students to learn and collaborate as they solve mobile and web development problems. We provide Android Training and Projects which help local business and community to grow.

1.) Place an EZ bar on the rack of preacher bench and load it with appropriate weight./n 2.) Adjust the bench and seating’s height until the benchreaches a comfortable position under across chest andunder armpits, while allowing full extension of upper armsand forearms.3.) Grasp bar with both hands and connect biceps tobring the bar towards the face.4.) Once at full concentration , with a controlled motionreverse the bar’s direction and back until the biceps are extended to complete the repetition.
